note.p: Horticulturalist. Son of Charles Mostyn Owen (1818–94). Emigrated to Oregon, USA, in 1879 as Wallis Nash’s assistant. Died in Nevada.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/892/79/24)
letter from H. N. Moseley, 5 February 1879
Oxfordshire, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1915 (Ancestry.com, accessed 12 December 2018)
